name: ManualSearcher
author: HandleidingKwijt

sections.description:
Adds the ManualSearcher widget. Allows users to search user manuals from our database in a language of your choice.

Widget settings

  1. Choose the source to search for manuals. Default: UK.
  2. Checkbox for displaying logo or text.
  3. Check the box add link to website to add a link to the website if you wish to do so.
  4. Replacement title for logo.
  5. Specify the width of the widget either in pixels or percentage. Default: 100%.
  6. Change the radius for more or less rounded corners. Default: 10px.
  7. Change the placeholder. Default: Enter Search Term.
  8. Specify the style of the border. Default: 1px solid #a8a8a8.
  9. Add a background color if you want. Default: none.
  10. Add a description to the widget. Default: none.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ManualSearcher directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance->Widgets and add the ManualSearcher widget from the Available Widgets to the widget area of your choose.
sections.faq:
What is the main purpose of this plugin

Let users find the manual they need.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • fixed style input field in widget
  • added minified styles

1.3

  • added new websites
  • fixed search query

1.2

  • added Manuall Finland to sources

1.1

  • bug fixes

1.0

  • Initial version
